info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 3 at 9:27AM EDT by NWS Peachtree City GA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...
Pew Creek at Patterson Road near Lawrenceville affecting Gwinnett County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Pew Creek at Patterson Road near Lawrenceville.
* WHEN...From this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Minor flooding of the natural flood plain begins. The parking lot of the Saratoga Swim and Tennis Club downstream from the river gauge begins to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM EDT Sunday was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.3 feet on 01/04/2024. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
